sentences.en: "But we're having such fun, aren't we?" he protested with a teasing smile.
sentences.cn: “可是我们现在玩得正开心，不是吗？”他带着戏谑的微笑申辩着。

sentences.en: Don't get upset—I was only teasing.
sentences.cn: 别不高兴，我只是在逗你玩。

sentences.en: Don't provoke the animal by teasing. It may bite you.
sentences.cn: 不要挑逗动物, 它会咬你的.

sentences.en: He must be teasing, or else he's mad.
sentences.cn: 他一定是在开玩笑, 不然他就是疯了.

sentences.en: He showed great self - control when they were teasing him.
sentences.cn: 别人开他玩笑,他表现出极大的 自制.

sentences.en: He told her how the boys in East Poldown had set on him, teasing him.
sentences.cn: 他告诉她东波尔顿的男孩们是如何攻击他、嘲笑他的。

sentences.en: I didn't think you meant that seriously; I thought you were teasing.
sentences.cn: 我未想到你是当真的, 我原以为你是开玩笑的.

sentences.en: I thought she was teasing, playing the innocent, but looking back, I'm not so sure.
sentences.cn: 我当时以为她是在勾引我，装纯情，不过现在回想起来，我又说不准了。

sentences.en: Sara was not amused by Franklin's teasing.
sentences.cn: 被富兰克林揶揄之后，萨拉的脸上全无笑意。

sentences.en: She gave over teasing and grinned at him.
sentences.cn: 她不再取笑他，只是朝他咧着嘴笑。

sentences.en: She tolerated the teasing, until the fourth grade.
sentences.cn: 她忍受着别人的嘲笑，一直忍到四年级。

sentences.en: Smith was at his most teasing.
sentences.cn: 史密斯完全是在开玩笑。

sentences.en: The boys got a rise out of Joe by teasing him.
sentences.cn: 孩子们取笑乔,把他惹怒了.

sentences.en: The girls watched, little teasing smiles animating their faces.
sentences.cn: 女孩们注视着，脸上挂着调皮的微笑，显得愈加活泼。

words.tran_cn: 烦恼地；故意使人烦恼地
戏弄；爱纠缠的小孩；挑逗者；卖弄风骚的女孩
取笑；戏弄；梳理；欺负；强求；使起毛

trans.tran_en: A teasing expression or manner shows that the person is not completely serious about what they are saying or doing

trans.tran_cn: 取笑，戏弄( tease的现在分词 )，梳理（羊毛等）
